title: I have a question about ranked team
body: if i have a ranked team of 8member can i play 3v3 ranked team and also 5v5 ranked team match at the same time? We are in the same ranked team/ so far i learned that we can't have 2 matches of 3v3 at the same time and only 1 match at a time but i'm curious w.e we can have both 3's and 5's of the same ranked team to play same time is it possible?

replies.body: I will  recruit member today and see if i have enough to do it if not then i will do it tomorrow

I spoke to one of our game specialists and he mentioned you *should* be able to do this. Give it a go when [ranked team play is enabled](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209964886-Ranked-Teams-Schedule) and let me know! ^.^

inorder to test i'm gonna need a team of 3v3 and 5v5 in the same ranked team

atm i haven't found enough ppl that are active enough to do so

You mean 8 guys being online at the same time and starting a 3v3 a 5v5 at the same time? Interesting question. For the 2x3v3, it makes sense because that would mess up with the match history and LP. Can you make the test 5v5+3v3 and let us know :).
